thread.title: Bystanders get a face full of snow at NY train station

title: Bystanders get a face full of snow at NY train station
text: Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Bystanders get a face full of snow at NY train station An Amtrak train blasted passengers with leftover snow from winter storm Stella as it pulled into the station in New York. Some people were knocked to the ground. Only minor injuries were reported. Post to Facebook Bystanders get a face full of snow at NY train station An Amtrak train blasted passengers with leftover snow from winter storm Stella as it pulled into the station in New York. Some people were knocked to the ground. Only minor injuries were reported.
